Data Structures
Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
ion_allocation_dataDOC: Ion Userspace API
ion_heap_queryStruct ion_heap_query - collection of data about all heaps - total number of heaps to be copied - buffer to copy heap data
metal_busLibmetal bus structure
metal_bus_opsBus operations
metal_common_stateSystem independent runtime state for libmetal
metal_deviceLibmetal device structure
metal_generic_shmemGeneric shared memory data structure
metal_init_paramsInitialization configuration for libmetal
metal_io_opsGeneric I/O operations
metal_io_regionLibmetal I/O region structure
metal_irqLibmetal interrupt structure
metal_irq_controllerLibmetal interrupt controller structure
metal_page_sizeStructure of shared page or hugepage sized data
metal_scatter_listMetal scatter list structure
metal_sgScatter/gather list element structure
metal_shm_providerShared memory provider data structure
metal_shm_refMetal shmem reference structure
metal_stateStructure for FreeRTOS libmetal runtime state
